title: Compute median from histogram of waiting times

content.description: The histogram below displays the frequencies of waiting times, in minutes, for 175 patients in a dentist's office.
content.question: Which of the following could be the median of the waiting times, in minutes?

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
